title: Infinite Stratos OVA
alternative_title: IS: Infinite Stratos Encore - Koi ni Kogareru Rokujuusou, IS 〈インフィニット・ストラトス〉 アンコール『恋に焦がれる六重奏』
description: Ichika has gone home for the holidays. On one particular day, his rest is cut short when the girls start showing up at his doorstep one after the other.
genre: [<Genre -> Action>, <Genre -> Comedy>, <Genre -> Harem>, <Genre -> Mecha>, <Genre -> Sci-Fi>, <Genre -> Shounen>]
